item.title: links for 2008-02-14
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• The Linux Documentation Project: Mirrors
    Perl patch for Mirror perl script. (If you are using mirror, a patch has been made available, needs to be applied to the file ftp.pl. You can grab a fully-patched ftp.pl (for mirror 2.9) here: http://ibiblio.org/gferg/patch/ftp.pl.gz)
    (tags: kiosk software perl mirror development programming)
